text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
Thou shalt have no other gods before me.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on a hill cannot be hid.
Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord.
And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
For we walk by faith, not by sight.
I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
Adam fell that men might be; and men are, that they might have joy.
Wherefore, men are free according to the flesh; and all things are given them which are expedient unto man.
When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.
And I will ease the burdens which are put upon your shoulders, that even you cannot feel them upon your backs.
By small and simple things are great things brought to pass.
Wickedness never was happiness.
And now, my sons, remember, remember that it is upon the rock of our Redeemer, who is Christ, the Son of God, that ye must build your foundation.
Now this is the commandment: Repent, all ye ends of the earth, and come unto me and be baptized in my name.
Behold, I will show unto the world that I will show miracles unto the children of men.
And if men come unto me I will show unto them their weakness.
But charity is the pure love of Christ, and it endureth forever.
Search these commandments, for they are true and faithful, and the prophecies and promises which are in them shall all be fulfilled.
I, the Lord, forgive sins unto those who confess their sins before me and ask forgiveness.
For behold, I, God, have suffered these things for all, that they might not suffer if they would repent.
And they saw the heavens opened, and they were filled with the glory of God.
Draw near unto me and I will draw near unto you.
And they shall see eye to eye when the Lord shall bring again Zion.
Whatever principle of intelligence we attain unto in this life, it will rise with us in the resurrection.
Let thy bowels be full of charity towards all men, and to the household of faith.
Wherefore, be not weary in well-doing, for ye are laying the foundation of a great work.
I, the Lord, am bound when ye do what I say; but when ye do not what I say, ye have no promise.
And whosoever receiveth you, there I will be also, for I will go before your face.
Therefore, let your hearts be comforted concerning Zion; for all flesh is in mine hands; be still and know that I am God.
